content:
You approach the pile of tools and pick up a hammer, feeling its weight in your hand. It's a sturdy tool, and you think it could do some damage if used as a weapon. As you look around, you notice that there are a few other hammers scattered around the site.

Just then, you hear a loud meowing noise coming from outside. You peek out the window and see a group of cats approaching the construction site. They seem to have spotted you, and they're not happy about your presence.

What do you do?
